name: Club Nova
content:
Club Nova wanted a sound system that could match its reputation as a centerpiece of the city's nightlife — powerful, precise, and capable of handling the energy of world-class DJs. We approached the project with a focus on acoustic performance, reliability, and atmosphere.

The system design revolves around dual 18-inch subwoofers for deep, tight low-end response, complemented by mid-high cabinets flown strategically to ensure even coverage across the dancefloor and bar zones. Each component was tuned through detailed measurement-based optimization, using room EQ and phase alignment to minimize reflections and dead zones.

Lighting and sound were integrated into a single control environment, allowing the venue staff to instantly switch between DJ performances, private events, and ambient lounge modes. The result is a club soundscape that's immersive but not overwhelming, with clean transients, strong definition in the vocal range, and a rich sense of depth.

Every aspect — from amplifier configuration to speaker positioning — was designed with long-term consistency in mind. Club Nova now delivers a sonic experience that's both physically powerful and acoustically refined, creating a dancefloor that feels alive even before the first track drops.
